name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course is designed for undergraduate students to develop their academic English language skills in preparation for an all-English learning environment. Students will engage actively in a variety of academic writing and speaking activities. Students will also learn general English syntax and structure of an academic essay as well as strategies for delivering a successful presentation for academic purposes.
scorePolicy: To be announced by the Media Center.
materials:
Cambridge Academic Writing Skills Student's Book Level 2
Great Writing, National Geographic Learning, Book 4
